member.name: T:MeridianSystems.Proliance.Business.CostControl.ContractCalculator.PreCommitInvoiceLineItemCalculations
member.summary: PreCommitInvoiceLineItem calculations that can be used in both Proliance Cost Control and Service Activator

members.member: PIV77059: The extension class has the ThisInvoiceGeneralAmtOldValue set by GetSafeOldValue, in some situations, ThisInvoiceGeneralAmt is changed indirectly by ToDateProgressGeneralAmt or TodateProgressAmt because ThisInvoiceGeneralAmt is anchor field and will be calculated when other fields changed. When ThisInvoiceGeneralAmt is changed we need to retain its old value to perform the retainage calculation which performed by delta. Because retainage is calculated using the delta of the ThisInvoiceGeneralAmt it can mistakenly recalculate retainage when ThisInvoiceGeneralAmt is unchanged and the old value is zero. We prevent this by not setting the old value if ThisInvoiceGeneralAmt is unchanged (i.e. If value >< _myThisInvoiceGeneralAmt).
